purpose: To serve as a curated repository of AI resources for developers, researchers, and enthusiasts
principle: Aggregates and organizes AI-related content, providing easy access to a wide range of resources
reusability: Open-source project that can be easily accessed and contributed to by the community
limitations: Primarily a static collection; does not offer dynamic content updates or personalized recommendations
